changeSet.comment: Notification message
Message title section
Message content section

column.name: content
column.value:
Dear $first_name $last_name,

We want to remind you that your plan will expire in $daysBeforeNotification days.

Please, renew your plan within $daysBeforeNotification days. Otherwise, a new default plan will be automatically subscribed for you.

Regards,
jBilling

changeSet.comment: Event Based Custom Notification listener task parameter
Confirmation message
Message title section
Message content section

column.name: content
column.value:
Dear $first_name $last_name,

You have reached the end of your plan subscription period.

A default plan was automatically subscribed for you.

Regards,
jBilling

changeSet.sql: insert into permission_role_map (permission_id,role_id)(select 923, id from role where role_type_id=2 and entity_id=${child.entity.id}); insert into permission_role_map (permission_id,role_id)(select 923, id from role where role_type_id=-1 and entity_id=${child.entity.id});

changeSet.id: JB-539 adding new payment method
changeSet.author: Neeraj Bhatt
changeSet.comment: binding single Chech with both account(Residential, Commercial/Industrial) types

column.name: account_type_id
column.valueComputed: (select ac.id from account_type ac,international_description description where ac.entity_id=${child.entity.id} and ac.id=description.foreign_id and description.content='Residential')

column.name: account_type_id
column.valueComputed: (select ac.id from account_type ac,international_description description where ac.entity_id=${child.entity.id} and ac.id=description.foreign_id and description.content='Commercial/Industrial')

changeSet.id: JB-302 - internal server error message is displayed when user try to delete invoice after run commission
changeSet.author: Javier Rivero

column.name: type_id
column.valueComputed: (select p.id from pluggable_task_type p where p.class_name = 'com.sapienter.jbilling.server.ediTransaction.task.CommissionInvoiceDeleteTask')

column.name: processing_order
column.valueComputed: coalesce((select max(pt.processing_order)+1 from pluggable_task pt where pt.type_id IN (select p.id from pluggable_task_type p where p.category_id = 17)), 1)

changeSet.id: JBIIE-488 update invoice related rejected error status
changeSet.author: Ambuj Aggarwal
changeSet.comment: update invoice related rejected error status to true

update.where: name='Rejected' and id IN (select etesm.edi_status_id from edi_type_edi_status_map etesm where etesm.edi_type_id in (select et.id from edi_type et where et.entity_id=${child.entity.id}))

changeSet.id: JBIIE-1499 set display order
changeSet.author: Hitesh Yadav
changeSet.comment: set display order for AIT

update.where: name='Service Information' and entity_type='ACCOUNT_TYPE' and entity_id=${child.entity.id}
name='Billing Information' and entity_type='ACCOUNT_TYPE' and entity_id=${child.entity.id}
name='Account Information' and entity_type='ACCOUNT_TYPE' and entity_id=${child.entity.id}

changeSet.id: JBIIE-1547 Add new AIT meta field in group Account Information
changeSet.author: Hitesh Yadav
changeSet.comment: create a new enumeration called Pass through charges
Add the new AIT meta field called Pass through charges in the group Account Information of Residential Account type

column.name: metafield_group_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT mfg.id FROM meta_field_group mfg where mfg.name='Account Information' AND mfg.account_type_id=(select act.id from account_type act, international_description ides where act.id=ides.foreign_id and ides.content='Residential' and entity_id=${child.entity.id}))

changeSet.comment: Add the new AIT meta field called Pass through charges in the group Account Information of Commercial/Industrial Account type

column.name: metafield_group_id
column.valueComputed: (SELECT mfg.id FROM meta_field_group mfg where mfg.name='Account Information' AND mfg.account_type_id=(select act.id from account_type act, international_description ides where act.id=ides.foreign_id and ides.content='Commercial/Industrial' and entity_id=${child.entity.id}))

changeSet.id: JBIIE-1535 add email validation rule in child
changeSet.author: Ambuj Aggarwal
changeSet.sql: update meta_field_name set validation_rule_id = (select max(t.id) from validation_rule t) where id in ( select mfn.id from meta_field_name mfn join metafield_group_meta_field_map mfgm on mfgm.meta_field_value_id = mfn.id join meta_field_group mfg on mfgm.metafield_group_id = mfg.id where mfn.name='Email' and mfn.entity_type = 'ACCOUNT_TYPE' and mfg.name = 'Service Information' and mfn.entity_id = ${child.entity.id} )

changeSet.id: JBIIE-1628 : updating notification message type for Qpay Control Center Alert
changeSet.author: Neeraj Bhatt

column.name: type_id
column.valueComputed: (select foreign_id from international_description where table_id=52 and psudo_column='description' and content='Qpay Control Center Alert')

update.where: id=(select id from notification_message where entity_id=${child.entity.id} and id in ( select message_id from notification_message_section where id in (select message_section_id from notification_message_line where content = 'Qpay Control Center Alert - ACH Return' )))

changeSet.id: JBIIE-1641 : Updating state value to abbreviated form in child company
changeSet.author: Neeraj Bhatt

update.where: value='New York' and enumeration_id=(select id from enumeration where name='STATE' and entity_id=${child.entity.id})
value='Texas' and enumeration_id=(select id from enumeration where name='STATE' and entity_id=${child.entity.id})
